QueryText: Asked about the management of Bacterial Wilt or Moko disease
KccAns: Drench soil with 1 Bordeaux mixture or Copper oxychloride 50 WP 2 gramlitre of water or Adopt crop rotation involving non-host crops for 12 months Before planting treat suckers with Copper oxychloride 50 WP 4 gramlitre of water for 30 minutes Drench soil with antibiotics like Streptomycin  Streptocycline 500 ppm 5 gram10 litre of water
